sense.gloss: laborious work, lucubration, lucubrations, painstakingly polishing a piece of literary work
to inlay, to set, to stud (e.g. star-studded sky), to enchase (something) with, to mount (gems)
engraving of lacquer-stained ivory (popular during the Tang dynasty)

words.gloss: laborious work, lucubration, lucubrations, painstakingly polishing a piece of literary work
to inlay, to set, to stud (e.g. star-studded sky), to enchase (something) with, to mount (gems)
